front.title: Initial and Pass Through Authentication Using Kerberos V5 and the GSS- API (IAKERB)

abstract.t: This document defines extensions to the Kerberos protocol and theGSS-API Kerberos mechanism that enable a GSS-API Kerberos client toexchange messages with the KDC using the GSS-API acceptor as theproxy, by encapsulating the Kerberos messages inside GSS-API tokens.With these extensions a client can obtain Kerberos tickets forservices where the KDC is not accessible to the client, but isaccessible to the application server.
